BodyName: Committee on Fire and Criminal Justice Services
Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Juvenile Justice

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York in relation to requiring the commissioner of the department of correction to  report on census data and  security  indicators involving adolescents in city jails.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Requiring the commissioner of the department of correction to give a monthly report to the council regarding census data and violent incidents involving adolescents in city jails.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to enact and pass and the Governor to sign legislation amending the Family Court Act by changing the juvenile status age to include sixteen, seventeen and eighteen year olds.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Amending the Family Court Act by changing the juvenile status age to include sixteen, seventeen and eighteen year olds.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to enact and pass and the Governor to sign legislation amending the Family Court Act by changing the juvenile status age to include sixteen, seventeen and eighteen year olds.
Items.ActionName: P-C Item Laid Over by Comm
